summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute an amendment to a Environmental Protection Agency grant and proceed with additional work on the Solid Waste Minimization, Reuse and Recycling Educational Materials project; authorizing expert and consultant services; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1991 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Department; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Engineering Department Operating Fund; and authorizing the acceptance of grant funds therefor.
